participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and caring, she values her family and can be introspective at times.
participant_1.background: My three sisters are the most important people in my life. I sometimes forget to walk my dogs, which I know is not good for them. I’ve been rejected several times and thought of giving up with this. I wear glasses all day. My mom teaches kindergarten and my dad is a tax assessor.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, he enjoys sharing experiences and has a positive outlook on life.
participant_2.background: My most exotic travel was to the Maldives where I went scuba diving to see the colorful fish and coral reefs. I check on my mother first thing in the morning. My favorite band is Nightwish. My favorite singer is Jess Greenberg. I do the shopping in my house.

content.text: I'm not sure if you are busy, but I wanted to ask about scuba diving.
I'm not busy, and I love scuba diving! Where did you want to go?
I think the Maldives looks amazing, but it's so expensive.
It is, but it's worth it! I saw so many colorful fish and coral reefs.
I'm sure! I think I need to get my certification first.
That's a good idea! There are some great places to go diving in the US.
Yeah, I've been looking into some places. I'm thinking about going to the Florida Keys.
That's a great place to go! I've been there a few times.
Have you ever been scuba diving in the Maldives?
Yes, I went a few years ago. It was amazing!
I bet! It looks so beautiful in the pictures.
It's even better in person! I'm glad you're thinking about getting your certification.
Me too! I think it would be a lot of fun.
It is! And it's a great way to see the underwater world.
I agree! I'm excited to start diving.
